mapper.select: SELECT comp_id , comp_nm , comp_contact , comp_email , comp_address , comp_desc , comp_status , comp_create_by , comp_modify_by , comp_create_date , comp_modify_date FROM tb_company WHERE comp_status != #{status}

SELECT id AS "id" , name AS "name" , contact AS "contact" , email AS "email" , address AS "address" , description AS "description" , create_by AS "create_by" , modify_by AS "modify_by" , create_date AS "create_date" , modify_date AS "modify_date" FROM tb_company WHERE id = #{id}
